name: Boom Boom Tanks
description:
Boom Boom Tanks! A WIP local multiplayer tank battle game!

MENU CONTROLS:
AD - P1 Menu navigation
C - Confirm
V - Cancel

JL - P2 Menu Navigation
LEFT ARROW - P2 Confirm
DOWN ARROW - P2 Cancel

INGAME CONTROLS:
WASD - P1 Control
C - Shoot
V - Reload

IJKL - P2 Control
LEFT ARROW - Shoot
DOWN ARROW - Reload
